mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.gsmc gsmc, t.gslb gslb, t.gssm gssm, t.jsgs jsgs, t.jsgsdw jsgsdw, t.sfqy sfqy, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM ZHJC_JSGS t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM ZHJC_JSGS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ZHJC_JSGS(uuid,gsmc,gslb,gssm,jsgs,jsgsdw,sfqy,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jsgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jsgsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE ZHJC_JSGS t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.uuid = #{value}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ZHJC_JSGS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
SELECT h.UUID uuid ,h.CSMC csmc ,h.JLDWDM jldwdm ,h.MRZ mrz ,h.GSID gsid ,h.SXH sxh FROM ZHJC_JSGS_CS h WHERE h.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND h.gsid = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE ZHJC_JSGS_CS t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.GSID = #{value}
